column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////We culminated our exploration of the Magnificent Mile with a trip to Lou Malnati's Pizzeria...unfortunately we got caught in crazy unexpected Chicago rainstorm so instead of arriving for an early dinner
column2: we arrived right at the peak of dinner time. That. Kinda. Stunk. We were hit with a wait over an hour
column3: but luckily Lou Malnati's is fairly aware of its ability to accommodate guests - definitely put your order in beforehand. They time it to come out shortly after you sit - genius!
